name: semana-javascript-expert06
description: Seja bem vindo(a) à sexta Semana Javascript Expert. Este é o código inicial para iniciar nossa jornada.

scripts.test: set LOG_DISABLED=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules && npx jest --no-cache --runInBand
scripts.test:watch: set LOG_DISABLED=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules && npx jest --no-cache --watchAll --runInBand
scripts.test:coverage: set LOG_DISABLED=true && set NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules && npx jest --no-cache --coverage tests/unit --runInBand
